data.description: Streamline and consolidate multiple segments and sources of sales and input data for understanding and deriving better sales insights to grow and run business better
data.purpose: Streamline and consolidate multiple segments and sources of sales and input data for understanding and deriving better sales insights to grow and run business better
data.actionable_data: Setup of pipelines to ingest data from various sources and setup ETL processes to transform the data into a more insight driven format. To assist business to drive more revenue growth
data.challenges: No Updates received from CC post submission of proposal
data.notes:
Proposal submitted on 09/Jun/25
Still under review with CC team till date

data.description: Automate the calculations being done for HDFC using manual excel macros to maintain vendor cost master, MOP and selling margins to assist in sales and margin reporting and revenue tracking (sales/refunds)
data.purpose: Automate the calculations being done for HDFC using manual excel macros to maintain vendor cost master, MOP and selling margins to assist in sales and margin reporting and revenue tracking (sales/refunds)
data.actionable_data: Implement automation to capture the various input sources like FYND report, Payment Gateway report, Vendor cost master, Mark up master and provide auto calculations for various reports
data.contact_points: CC - Manju, Nishant, Ganesh ; ST - Thawpeek / Abhinav
data.challenges:
1. Input report layouts still being finalized for FYND and Payment gateway
2. Input test data for Payables automation still pending with CC team
3. Change requests coming in on ad-hoc basis as the system is being tested in UAT

data.description:
The RAG-Service enables users to upload PDF, Word, text, Excel, or PowerPoint documents and query their content for enhanced information retrieval and analysis.

Intent is to create a virtual agents / service which can be leveraged to support activities like learning, customer support etc to boost employee productivity
data.purpose:
The RAG-Service enables users to upload PDF, Word, text, Excel, or PowerPoint documents and query their content for enhanced information retrieval and analysis.

Intent is to create a virtual agents / service which can be leveraged to support activities like learning, customer support etc to boost employee productivity
data.actionable_data: Provides accurate, context-aware responses to user queries based on document content, facilitating informed decision-making.
data.contact_points: CC - Kushal, CX - Nishit; ST - Dr Venkat
data.challenges: Achieves accuracies above 95%, with additional testing required to ensure reliability.
data.notes: POC - UAT in progress. ETA - 21st Aug

data.description: The GA dashboards enables users to visualise the different metrics using the GA4 data and transactional data from databases such as MySql and Postgres.
data.purpose: The GA dashboards enables users to visualise the different metrics using the GA4 data and transactional data from databases such as MySql and Postgres.
data.actionable_data: The dashboard gives an insight into user behaviour, customer segmentation, volume based metrics to track sales and margin across various categories, products.
data.contact_points: CC - Srishti / Uma ; ST - Sakthi / Abhinav
data.challenges:
Dashboard - HDFC - KPI's scoping in progress with CC team. Fynd and Payment reports still under finalization with CC

Transction DB for other staccs - Replication cost and approval still under discussion internally by CC team

Improvements Done  - Bigquery Support added to improve performance of Dashboards to overcome postrgres technical syncing issues

Potential Risks - Website updates will lead to data mapping issues causing incorrect data to be reflected in Dashboards. Potential issue with UI changes impacting GA
data.notes:
Live Dashboards - 1 (Tripstacc)
Ready for Go Live - 1 (Shopstacc)
Under Internal Review - 2 (ET, BOM)
In UAT - 1 (BOB)
Requirement Scoping - 1 (HDFC)
Email Scheduler - Live

data.description: Boost productivity for CX Agents on ground by having customer CRM data accessible easily and faster
data.purpose: Boost productivity for CX Agents on ground by having customer CRM data accessible easily and faster
data.actionable_data: Provide an integrated UI to the CX Agent on ground to simplify the way to identify the originating customer and retrieve their respective transactional data without searching across multiple portals
data.contact_points: CC - Nishit Gandhi ; ST - Deva / Abhinav
data.challenges:
Possible Challenges -
1. Would require replication of existing transaction DB's which will incur cost for CC
2. If DB approach is ruled out then screen scrapping would not be appropriate for accuracy of data capture
3. Data Security perspective to be reviewed with CC team (Rajeev / Kunal) if agent ID's could be created to export reports on a scheduled basis
data.notes: Initial risk and requirement scoping in progress

data.description: The software aggregates and compares prices from Amazon, Flipkart, Croma, and Reliance to optimize pricing strategies for enhanced marketability.
data.purpose: The software aggregates and compares prices from Amazon, Flipkart, Croma, and Reliance to optimize pricing strategies for enhanced marketability.
data.actionable_data: Provides real-time price comparisons, competitor pricing trends, and demand fluctuations to inform dynamic pricing decisions.
data.contact_points: CC - Nishant Bhagaya / Ganesh; ST - Dr Venkat
data.challenges:
Overcomes Amazon's bot detection algorithms using IP rotation and CAPTCHA-solving techniques to discreetly scrape prices.

Outstanding Items - Input files awaited from CC(Ganesh) for remaining portals.

data.description: Provide Agentic support for L1 screening and parsing of resume to help shortlist interview candidates for recruitment
data.purpose: Provide Agentic support for L1 screening and parsing of resume to help shortlist interview candidates for recruitment
data.actionable_data: Agent to provide facility to generate Job Descriptions for various roles and implement a mathematical model to calculate the profile fitment score against the job posting
data.contact_points: CC - Kunal/Sourabh Kala ; ST - Dr Venkat
data.notes: Procurement of requisite infra in progress
